summary: Patch for Requiem and Qaxe's Questorium.
descriptionHtml:
I made a oacth to use the great mods Requiem and Qaxe's Questorium together. Cause I want to Play as a Blue elf.
So here are the changes in the race stats:[list=1]
[*]Raised the starting magicka from 50 to 100
[*]Raised the starting Stamina from 50 to 100
[*]Lowered the magicka regen from 3 to 1.5
[*]Lowered the stamina regen from 3 to 1.5
[*]Add the strong stomach to the blue elf race
[/list]I have the permission from Ahondara to publish this patch.
author: UrriroSiricis
